Audio.Locality: Km12, Piste de la Crique Dardanelles, Mana
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 10m. Single song phrase from male about 10 mins after playback, 0.5m above ground. Very soft vocalization with no bill movement and almost no throat movement. Same bird as XC122499.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
